summary: The contact owns a 2011 Ford Fusion. The contact stated while driving 60 mph, the contact loss control of the vehicle and was not able to steer the vehicle. The contact stated that the battery and power steering warning light were illuminated. The vehicle was taken to the local dealer where it was diagnosed with the rack and pinion needing to be replaced. The vehicle was not repaired. The contact was relating the failure to NHTSA campaign number: 15V340000 (Steering). The manufacturer was informed of the failure and informed the contact that the recall already had been serviced and the vehicle was out of warranty. The failure mileage was approximately 108,000.
